data.persona: I hide in the gaps behind the walls of the castle.  I come out at night to steal food from the castle's kitchen.  When I come out to steal food from the castle's kitchen I have to avoid cats.  The castle cats will try to kill me if they see me come out to steal food.
data.description:
You are in the Cave.
Cold and dark, the moist cool walls enclose all who proceed. With just torches to light the way the large opening gets smaller and smaller.
There's a passage, a Wall, a Bone, an opening, a torch, and a rock here.
The ghost and the cockroach are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need a torch to see if there are any foes around
data.mid_motivation: I must find my way through the Cave to get to the castle's kitchen
data.long_motivation: I am planning to travel to a neighboring kingdom and need all the strength I can get
